head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths APOSTLE, CHRISTOS N.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths APOSTLE, CHRISTOS N.

block.p: APOSTLE-Christos N. On October 10, 2000. Beloved son of Mary and the late Nicholas C. Devoted brother of Basil & Maria Gregory and Maria and Jim and Tina. Dear nephew of Georgia Podes. Loving uncle and cousin. Reposing Riverdale Funeral Home, Inc., 5044 Broadway corner 214th Street, N.Y.C. Visiting hours. Thursday 7-9 PM and Friday 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Funeral services Saturday 9:30 AM at St. Spyridon G.O. Church, 124 Wadsworth Ave., NYC. Interment Mt. Hope Cemetery. Donations to St. Spyridon Church preferred.
